hymn.title: Lord of glory, we adore Thee

layout.singingstanza: Lord of glo -- ry, we a -- dore Thee! Christ of God, as -- cend -- ed high! Heart and soul we bow be -- fore Thee, Glo -- rious now be -- yond the sky: Thee we wor -- ship, Thee we praise— Ex -- cel -- lent in all Thy ways.

lyrics.stanza: Lord of glory, we adore Thee! Christ of God, ascended high! Heart and soul we bow before Thee, Glorious now beyond the sky: Thee we worship, Thee we praise— Excellent in all Thy ways.
Anointed King, with glory crowned, Rightful Heir and Lord of all! Once rejected, scorned, disowned, E'en by those Thou cam'st to call: Thee we honor, Thee adore— Glorious now and evermore.
